summary: This document is an email chain from July 1, 2020, discussing a background check on Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings and her potential marital status. It includes a list of her siblings with notes on their travel history and residence, and reveals a search for a marriage license between Maxwell and Scott Borgerson.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The central subject of the email chain; the correspondence is checking her marital status and listing her siblings.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.role: Person of interest in marital status check
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of a search for a marriage license to determine if he is married to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Rebecca Piorunneck
persons.context: Identified as the person Scott Borgerson married on May 19, 2001, according to a marriage license check.

persons.context: Listed as sibling #1 of Ghislaine Maxwell in the provided sibling list.

persons.context: Listed as sibling #3 of Ghislaine Maxwell in the provided sibling list, noted as deceased.

persons.name: Ann (Anne) Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as sibling #4 of Ghislaine Maxwell; also known as Anne Holve, married to Lawrence Holve, with an outbound flight to the UK on May 23, 2015.

persons.name: Lawrence Holve
persons.context: Identified as the husband of Ann (Anne) Maxwell (Anne Holve).

persons.name: Kevin Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as sibling #5 of Ghislaine Maxwell, with an inbound flight to Boston from London on February 29, 2020.

persons.name: Michael Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as sibling #6 of Ghislaine Maxwell, noted as deceased.

persons.name: Ian Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as sibling #7 of Ghislaine Maxwell, with an outbound flight to London from Boston on December 27, 2017.

persons.name: Philip Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as sibling #8 of Ghislaine Maxwell, with no travel history and no identified US residence.

keyFacts: A background check was conducted on Ghislaine Maxwell's eight siblings, listing their names, marital status, residence, and travel history.
A specific inquiry was made to determine if Ghislaine Maxwell was married, particularly to Scott Borgerson.
The search for a marriage license for Ghislaine Maxwell in every state returned negative results.
A marriage license was found for Scott Borgerson to Rebecca Piorunneck on May 19, 2001, indicating he was not married to Maxwell.
The document shows investigative interest in Maxwell's family connections and personal status around the time of her legal proceedings.
